## Quick Reference

### Workflow Triggers

| Workflow            | Trigger          | When to Use      |
| ------------------- | ---------------- | ---------------- |
| `release.yml`       | Manual button    | Planned releases |
| `release-on-pr.yml` | PR merge + label | Feature releases |
| `deploy.yml`        | Push to main     | After release    |

### Version Increments

| Type  | Example         | Use For          |
| ----- | --------------- | ---------------- |
| Patch | 0.22.2 â†’ 0.22.3 | Bug fixes        |
| Minor | 0.22.2 â†’ 0.23.0 | New features     |
| Major | 0.22.2 â†’ 1.0.0  | Breaking changes |

### Labels

| Label           | Version | Color    |
| --------------- | ------- | -------- |
| `release:patch` | +0.0.1  | ðŸŸ¢ Green  |
| `release:minor` | +0.1.0  | ðŸŸ¡ Yellow |
| `release:major` | +1.0.0  | ðŸ”´ Red    |
